name: hunger-switch
effect: The Pokémon changes its form, alternating between its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of every turn.
short_effect: Causes Morpeko to change its form each turn, alternating between Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode
flavor_text: The Pokémon changes its form, alternating between its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of every turn.
